description:
The Yukon is a trekking boot that will go virtually anywhere. The higher upper provides enhanced protection for the sensitive ankle zone on longer day hikes or multi-day trekking trips. Underfoot, the cushioning Vibram® sole provides additional stability, plus reliable grip on rock, scree and root-strewn trails. Inside, the comfortable leather lining ensures a pleasant foot climate.

*** All Hanwag boots are sold under UK sizing - Please see size chart for details/conversion.
name: HanWag Yukon - Mens
